duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting with the monthly close, performing operational and/or other ad-hoc financial analyses, managing certain financial processes, and providing decision support.
Communicating with external vendors, clients, and internal support teams regarding financial matters and issues.
Managing case queues within SalesForce, researching and responding to finance-related client and customer inquiries.
Balancing, processing, reporting, and communicating chargebacks, debit blocks, and ACH returns.
Performing Ad-Hoc duties or special projects in support of the department as assigned.
Assisting with implementation fees and interchange analysis.

education_certification.credential: College degree in related field (Business, Finance, etc) or equivalent work experience
